actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the sale or abandonment of certain railroad lines.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that until such time as the Congress has acted to dispose of pending legislation dealing with the current railroad crisis in the Northeastern United States, no court of the United States shall authorize any sale or abandonment of any railroad nor should the Interstate Commerce Commission approve or authorize any sale or abandonment.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the sale or abandonment of certain railroad lines.
